trans-unit.source: Specifies a NuGet package source to use during installation.
trans-unit.target: 설치 중 사용할 NuGet 패키지 소스를 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: SOURCE
If there were no additional instructions, you can type the following command to invoke the tool: {0} Tool '{1}' (version '{2}') was successfully installed.
trans-unit.target: 설치했습니다. 추가 지침이 없는 경우 셸에 다음 명령을 직접 입력하여 {0}을(를) 호출할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: NuGet Package Id of the tool to install.
Installs a tool for use on the command line.
The NuGet configuration file to use.
The target framework to install the tool for.
Version of the tool package in NuGet.
PACKAGE_ID
Please specify one tool Package Id to install.
trans-unit.target: 설치할 도구 패키지 ID를 하나 지정하세요.

trans-unit.source: Install user wide.
.NET Install Command
The --global switch (-g) is currently required because only user wide tools are supported.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 전체 도구만 지원되므로 -global 스위치(-g)가 필요합니다.

trans-unit.source: The settings file in the tool's NuGet package is invalid: {0}
trans-unit.target: 도구의 NuGet 패키지에 있는 설정 파일이 잘못되었습니다. {0}

trans-unit.source: Tool '{0}' failed to install.
Tool '{0}' failed to install. Please contact the tool author for assistance.
trans-unit.target: '{0}' 도구를 설치하지 못했습니다. 도구 작성자에게 문의하세요.

trans-unit.source: Tool '{0}' is already installed.
Failed to create shell shim for tool '{0}': {1}
trans-unit.target: Failed to create shell shim for tool '{0}': {1}

trans-unit.source: NuGet configuration file '{0}' does not exist.
trans-unit.target: NuGet configuration file '{0}' does not exist.

trans-unit.source: The tool package could not be restored.
